mapper.select: SELECT B_ID as b_Id, B_TITLE as b_Title, B_CONTENT as b_Content, B_WRITER as b_Writer, B_GROUP as b_Group, B_CATEGORY as b_Category, B_CREATED_DATE as b_CreatedDate, B_UPDATED_DATE as b_UpdatedDate FROM BOARD WHERE b_group = 'F' -- 게시판만 조회 ORDER BY b_id DESC -- 번호를 기준으로 내림차순 정렬

SELECT B_ID as b_Id, B_TITLE as b_Title, B_CONTENT as b_Content, B_WRITER as b_Writer, B_GROUP as b_Group, B_CATEGORY as b_Category, B_CREATED_DATE as b_CreatedDate, B_UPDATED_DATE as b_UpdatedDate FROM BOARD WHERE b_group = 'F' -- 게시판만 검색 AND LOWER(${category}) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{query}) || '%' -- 대소문자 구분 없이 검색 ORDER BY b_id DESC -- 번호를 기준으로 내림차순 정렬

SELECT B_ID as b_Id, B_TITLE as b_Title, B_CONTENT as b_Content, B_WRITER as b_Writer, B_GROUP as b_Group, B_CATEGORY as b_Category, B_CREATED_DATE as b_CreatedDate, B_UPDATED_DATE as b_UpdatedDate FROM BOARD WHERE b_group = 'F' -- 자유게시판만 조회 AND b_category = #{category} -- 카테고리 필터링 ORDER BY b_id DESC -- 번호를 기준으로 내림차순 정렬

SELECT B_ID as b_Id, B_TITLE as b_Title, B_CONTENT as b_Content, B_WRITER as b_Writer, B_GROUP as b_Group, B_CATEGORY as b_Category, B_CREATED_DATE as b_CreatedDate, B_UPDATED_DATE as b_UpdatedDate FROM BOARD WHERE B_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( b_id, b_title, b_content, b_writer, b_group, b_category, b_created_date, b_updated_date) VALUES ( freeboard_seq.NEXTVAL, -- 자유게시판 시퀀스 #{b_Title}, #{b_Content}, #{b_Writer}, 'F', CASE WHEN TRIM(#{b_Category}) = 'QnA' THEN 'Q' WHEN TRIM(#{b_Category}) = 'Tips' THEN 'T' WHEN TRIM(#{b_Category}) = 'Free' THEN 'F' ELSE NULL -- 예외 처리 END, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
